categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Red Dragon was an Imperial Star Destroyer that was presumably looking for Rebel Alliance activity near an area where the BFF-1 bulk freighter Op Mus was awaiting repairs from stormtrooper transport Jaamn. It had a complement of TIE Avengers.
The ship only appears if the freighter Op Mus is destroyed.
